meanings.sent1: The clown's dafter antics made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: It was dafter to wear shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent3: His dafter jokes always brought smiles to our faces.
meanings.sent4: Her dafter ideas were like colorful balloons in a gray sky.
meanings.sent5: The dafter puppy chased its tail in circles.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of sense or judgment
meanings.sent1: The dafter decision was to jump off the roof.
meanings.sent2: It was dafter to trust a stranger with all your money.
meanings.sent3: His dafter choices led to some interesting stories.
meanings.sent4: Her dafter actions were like a ship without a compass.
meanings.sent5: The dafter plan involved using a spoon to dig a tunnel.

meanings.sent1: The dafter man claimed he could talk to squirrels.
meanings.sent2: It was dafter to believe in flying pigs.
meanings.sent3: His dafter theories about aliens always amused us.
meanings.sent4: Her dafter behavior was like a tornado in a teacup.
meanings.sent5: The dafter scientist tried to turn water into chocolate.
